channel.title: syntax on Home
channel.description: Recent content in syntax on Home

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Tweemoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. In this theme, you can use Twemoji kit simply writing emoji and then adding this param in the config.toml file. twemoji = true More info in the theme wiki on Github.
